talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The part is shining like it's new)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Berlin$
Hmm, seems like we're done.

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Are you impressed?
When I was younger, I….

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Tsk tsk. You should have more patience.
Here, take this part and the projector and go to Tel Noir Temple.
I will take a few more equipment and join you soon.

$Academic Comelina$
What happened?
(You can get the quest from Saint Haven's Blacksmith Berlin)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Did you get the part?
(You can get the quest from Saint Haven's Blacksmith Berlin)

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Don't leave that little lady waiting for you for too long.
It's Tel Noir Temple.

$Academic Comelina$
Oh I was waiting for you!

$Academic Comelina${action:Talk}
Please listen carefully and don't be too surprised.
Actually, this airship was meant to be a part of the operation Desert Storm!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I saw the details from the projector….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
What…?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It just played… When I pressed those buttons….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Th-there was no such function on that device!

$Academic Comelina$
….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, I brought the part too. (Show her what you brought)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
So if we get one more part, we can repair it into an airship with enormous powers…?!

$Academic Comelina$
….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, Blacksmith Berlin will be here at any moment now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Right… Thank you for bringing it here….
But I can't fix this by myself….

$Academic Comelina$
…….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>……. (She looks like she is going to cry)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
…….

$Academic Comelina$
…Ah… yeah…. I… Hahaha….
I must have forgotten my place…

$Academic Comelina$
Then I will repair it together with Mr. Berlin when he arrives….

$Academic Comelina$
No it's okay… Hahahaha.

(Academic Comelina looks far away. Seems like it would be better to leave her alone.
She is quietly whispering something to herself.)

$Academic Comelina$
…The people of the past are really great. You can decode the password so quickly, and you have even found the missing part…
I'm happy that everything is progressing very quickly, but a little worried at the same time…

$Academic Comelina$
…Hmm….
Wouldn't it be fine without me?

$Academic Comelina$
Oh, someone is coming!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
It wouldn't be good go there alone. I'm going to go to Tel Noir Temple too.
I heard that you were in charge of bringing the part there. Hurry along.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Give him the part and the projector)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Blacksmith Berlin$
Amazing. Such thing really existed!!
Give me the missing part and the projector. I will start with the repair right away.

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Who's that lady there?

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Oh, so she is the lady from the future?
Hmm… But she doesn't really….
She's different from what I thought.

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Hey there pretty lady! I have a question!
The connection between these two parts are….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The Academic looks like she is feeling better)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Yes!

$Master Sorceress Stella$
…….
(Stella doesn't look too good. Go and talk to her)

$Academic Comelina$
Is that Berlin?
He looks very young here in the past.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
……
(Stella doesn't look too good.)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Why are you still there? Quickly go to the temple.
(Go to Tel Noir Temple)

$Blacksmith Berlin$
What are you still doing here?.
(Go to Tel Noir Temple)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
…….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Same face? (Is it the one I saw last time…?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella$
…Actually, I saw a girl who looked exactly the same as that girl on my way here.
Luckily the girl didn't notice me.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Yes, I think she was that clone or something too….
It's not a big deal but I keep thinking about what she said.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
She said [Everything is going well according to plan].
Don't you think they're a little too unconcerned when they are about to lose their airship?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
And that girl called Comelina seems to be on our side….
If our enemies feel that their plan is going well even when she has helped us this much, I'm thinking she might be a spy.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Hush! Not too loud! I'm just stating a possibility, not that she really is one.
So why don't you find out?.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
And you're her closest friend now.
I'll discuss with Berlin on what we should do next.

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Yeah so this part is… &(*#&$@ under the theory of….@#$^&*!
(He is discussing about the airship. Talk to Stella)

$Academic Comelina$
That's right. Here, the pressure from the screw will be….
(She is discussing about the airship. Talk to Stella)

$Academic Comelina$
Berlin is great.
I didn't know the repair would be finished so soon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I think you're really brave to be travelling around from such a young age. </html>
<html>Don't you have any friends in the future?</html>
<html>I'm curious why you are fighting against the people from the future.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
What is it?

$Academic Comelina$
Well, I'm not a kid….
But thank you for your compliments.

$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina looks dejected)
…I don't know.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But you must have precious people in the future too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
I have been fighting in this world for some time now.
The people in this era are fighting with their lives at stake….
I don't think it's right to destroy their lives just so that my world can survive.

$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina smiles bitterly)
There were two… but one of them only thought of me as a tool.
And the other one….

$Academic Comelina$
He is nice to everyone and everyone needs him….
He is precious to everyone.

$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina smiled gently)
Yes, he is a very good person. As much as being called the guardian of the future.
Though his reputation doesn't seem so good here….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would like to meet him too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Of course, He lives on to the future where I am from.
I will fight, at least for the sake of protecting him..

$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina suddenly turned away)
Erm….
you will meet him someday.

$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina smiles)
Anyway, I'm happy that you trust me, {user_nick}.
I never thought I could fight alongside one of the Six Heroes.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A title of a hero… is too heavy for me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Yes, {user_nick}. You are one of the Six Heroes in the future.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>…You're too kind. Who are the rest of the heroes?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
No way! {user_nick}, your holy light has become the hope for many people.
And without you, {user_nick}, the 6 heroes might not have existed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Would there have been such a person...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Umm… It is forbidden to release too much information about the future.
And you will meet them soon,
or in fact, you may have even met them already.

$Academic Comelina$
I think giving hints would be fine. So… erm…
please try to understand women.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don't know what you're talking about but… Thank you for your advice.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
They say there's nothing more difficult than understanding a woman's heart.
If not handled correctly, it can bring snowstorms in the middle of the summer.
It's very important.
(Comelina is glaring at you)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>A date? You mean like the one on calendars?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina looks at you suspiciously)
Do you really know? About going on a date or….

$Academic Comelina$
……What?! You're hopeless.
Ah….
I feel sorry for that person….

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>(Anyway, Comelina looks happier than usual. I've never seen her like this before)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
(Comelina puffs her cheeks)
Nooo don't tease me. I was shocked.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>(Anyway, Comelina looks happier than usual. I've never seen her like this before)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Academic Comelina$
Erm, can I trust you…?
{user_nick}, peace of this era lies in your hands!!
This is not a joke.

$Academic Comelina$
Huh? I think Stella is calling you.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
{user_nick}! We have to go back now.
It's late. What are you going to do about that girl?

$Academic Comelina$
Umm… I will look at the airship a little more.
There might be other clues.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
(Stella looks at her with suspicious eyes)
Well… okay. Let's go back, {user_nick}.
We have work to do.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Don't act like you're suspicious. Be natural.
(Talk to Academic Comelina)

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Hmm… the engine style is very familiar. It's as if I designed this myself…!
Well, that made it much easier to fix the airship.
(Talk to Academic Comelina)

$Academic Comelina$
…I hope to see you again.
(Go back to Saint Haven and talk to Stella)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Tell her about your conversation with Comelina)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Stella$
So, what did she say?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
That sounds like she was abandoned by the people from the future
Or maybe she's just young…?
Should we trust her?

$Master Sorceress Stella$
It's too early for us to decide yet, but I think the truth will be revealed soon.
(Stella sighed quietly)
…The Royal Castle has sent soldiers.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
I think Stuart made his move.
I bet he is planning to bring that girl from the future to the Royal Castle for questioning.

$Master Sorceress Stella$
My sentiments exactly, but there's nothing we can do.
I didn't know they would act without brains.
I hope they'll bring her here safely.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Master Sorceress Stella$
…I hope everything goes well.

$Blacksmith Berlin$
Stuart is skipping with joy these days. He got a hold of some object from the future and he is staring at it every single day .
He might faint when he sees the airship.
(Talk to Saint Haven's Master Sorceress Stella)

$Master Sorceress Stella$
Hush. Tell me at Saint Haven.
(Talk to Saint Haven's Master Sorceress Stella)

qstep_change.comment: 아카데믹에 대한 썰은 전용 섭퀘로 하나 더 있습니다. 아카데믹 외 클래스의 플레이어만 플레이 가능.

journal.title: History of the Future I
journal.contents:
Ask Blacksmith Berlin if he is done with the repair.

Saint Haven → Blacksmith Berlin

journal.title: History of the Future II
journal.contents:
Go to Tel Noir Temple and meet Academic Comelina.

Riverwort Wharf (Tel Numara Gates) → Tel Noir Temple (Academic Comelina)
journal.destination: Go to Tel Noir Temple and talk to Academic Comelina
journal.todo_msg: Go to Tel Noir Temple and meet Academic Comelina.

journal.title: History of the Future III
journal.contents:
Give the part to Blacksmith Berlin who has come to Tel Noir Temple.

Riverwort Wharf (Tel Numara Gates) → Tel Noir Temple (Blacksmith Berlin)
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Blacksmith Berlin at Tel Noir Temple.

journal.title: History of the Future IV
journal.contents:
Master Sorceress Stella doesn't look good.
Ask her if something is wrong.

Riverwort Wharf (Tel Numara Gates) → Tel Noir Temple(Master Sorceress Stella)
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Master Sorceress Stella at Tel Noir Temple.

journal.title: History of the Future V
journal.contents:
Stella was suspicious of Academic Comelina.
Talk to Academic Comelina and find out what she is thinking about.

Riverwort Wharf (Tel Numara Gates) → Tel Noir Temple (Academic Comelina)

journal.title: History of the Future VI
journal.contents:
Master Sorceress Stella who has gone to Saint Haven is taking a long time.
To be safe, go to Master Sorceress Stella and check on the situation.

Saint Haven → Master Sorceress Stella
journal.todo_msg: Go back to Saint Haven's Master Sorceress Stella.
